scripts.test: npm run test:web && npm run test:mobile
scripts.maestro:login: export PATH="$PATH":"$HOME/.maestro/bin" && export JAVA_HOME=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/brew --prefix openjdk@17) && maestro test mobile/flows/login.yaml
scripts.maestro:validation: export PATH="$PATH":"$HOME/.maestro/bin" && export JAVA_HOME=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/brew --prefix openjdk@17) && maestro test mobile/flows/login-validation.yaml
scripts.maestro:dashboard: export PATH="$PATH":"$HOME/.maestro/bin" && export JAVA_HOME=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/brew --prefix openjdk@17) && maestro test mobile/flows/dashboard-navigation.yaml
scripts.maestro:journey: export PATH="$PATH":"$HOME/.maestro/bin" && export JAVA_HOME=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/brew --prefix openjdk@17) && maestro test mobile/flows/user-journey.yaml
scripts.maestro:all: export PATH="$PATH":"$HOME/.maestro/bin" && export JAVA_HOME=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/brew --prefix openjdk@17) && maestro test mobile/flows/
scripts.maestro:studio: export PATH="$PATH":"$HOME/.maestro/bin" && export JAVA_HOME=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/brew --prefix openjdk@17) && maestro studio
